title: Travel boom, festive cheer open jobs in hospitality
description: Some 70,000-80,000 jobs (a mix of permanent and temporary roles) are likely to be created as the festive pickup in demand also coincides with the Cricket World Cup, with matches being held in 10 different cities, according to an estimate by staffing company TeamLease.
